questions.question: What are the characteristics of an Isometric Sketch?

choices.answer: A sketch in which an objects parallel edges are drawn at 30°
Projecting the visible faces on a 2D plane.
Preliminary visual of a possible idea for a design.
Pictorial drawing in which Vanishing points are used.

questions.question: Including three primary views of an object that are sketched using orthographic projections.

choices.answer: Orthographic sketch
Thumbnail sketch
Multi view sketch
Perspective sketch

questions.question: What are the characteristics of a Thumbnail sketch?

choices.answer: Projecting the visible face is on a 2D plane
type of pictorial drawing in which Vanishing points are used
A preliminary visual of a possible idea for a design.
A sketch in which object parallel edges are drawn at 30°

questions.question: What are the characteristics of a perspective sketch?

choices.answer: A preliminary visual of a possible idea for a design
pictorial drawing in which Vanishing points are used.
Views of the visible faces on a 2D plane
Orthographic projection

questions.question: Projecting the visible faces on a 2D plane

choices.answer: Orthographic projection
Thumbnail Sketch
Multi view sketch
Isometric Sketch
